present.name: DeProp
present.subtitle: Real estate dApp
present.description: Real estate dApp on Solana where properties are represented as NFTs. Smart contracts automate buying, selling, and renting, with rent payments and ownership transfers handled via blockchain using cryptocurrencies.

present.name: MevBot
present.subtitle: A Solana mev bot
present.description: A Solana MEV (Maximal Extractable Value) bot is an automated program that detects and executes profitable transactions, such as arbitrage or liquidation opportunities, on the Solana blockchain by reordering, inserting, or censoring transactions in a block to maximize gains.

futur.name: TokenForge
futur.subtitle: Solana token creator & NFT minting
futur.description: decentralized application enabling users to create and mint both fungible tokens and unique NFTs on the Solana blockchain, offering a seamless interface for tokenization.

futur.name: SkyShield
futur.subtitle: Fligh Delay insurance
futur.description: A blockchain-based insurance solution that compensates users automatically for flight delays, using smart contracts on Solana to ensure transparent, real-time claims processing.

futur.name: YieldQuest
futur.subtitle: Solana-based Real-time DeFi Yield Aggregator with Dynamic NFT Rewards
futur.description: A decentralized finance platform on Solana that aggregates real-time yield from various DeFi protocols, maximizing user returns. Dynamic NFTs are awarded based on user participation and performance, unlocking additional rewards and gamifying the yield farming experience.

commented.name: Password Generator
commented.description: A simple password generator developed in Rust. You can chose what do you want in your password and the length of it. It will then generate you a password.

commented.name: Clipboard Manager
commented.subtitle: A Rust app that stores your clipboard history
commented.description: A cool application where whenever you copy something to your clipboard, it stores it and let you be able to copy it back later. Even if you copy several things within that time.
